member.name: IMFSensorDevice.GetDeviceAttributes
member.summary: Gets the for the sensor group.
member.param: The interface representing the internal attribute store of the sensor device.

returns.para: The method returns an HRESULT. Possible values include, but are not limited to, those in the following table.

listheader.description: The sensor device has not been initialized.

member.name: IMFSensorDevice.GetDeviceId
member.summary: Gets the unique identifier for the device. This value is currently unused.
member.param: The unique identifier for the device.

returns.para: The method returns an HRESULT. Possible values include, but are not limited to, those in the following table.

listheader.description: The sensor group has not been initialized.

member.name: IMFSensorDevice.GetDeviceType
member.summary: Gets a value that specifies the type of sensor device represented by the object.
member.param: A value that specifies the type of sensor device represented by the object.

returns.para: The method returns an HRESULT. Possible values include, but are not limited to, those in the following table.

listheader.description: The sensor group has not been initialized.

member.name: IMFSensorDevice.GetFlags
member.summary: Gets the flags set for the sensor device. This method is reserved for future use.
member.param: The flags set for the sensor device.

returns.para: The method returns an HRESULT. Possible values include, but are not limited to, those in the following table.

listheader.description: The sensor group has not been initialized.

member.name: IMFSensorDevice.GetSensorDeviceMode
member.summary: Gets a value that specifies the current sharing mode of the sensor device, which is either controller or shared.
member.param: If the call succeeds, receives a member of the , specifying the current mode of the sendsor device.

returns.para: The method returns an HRESULT. Possible values include, but are not limited to, those in the following table.

listheader.description: The sensor group has not been initialized.

member.name: IMFSensorDevice.GetStreamAttributes
member.summary: Gets the stream attribute store with the specified index.
member.param: A member of the enumeration specifying whether the attribute store is being requested for an input or output stream.
The 0-based index of the stream to be retrieved. The index must be between 0 and the value returned by - 1.
The interface representing a copy internal attribute store of the stream.

returns.para: The method returns an HRESULT. Possible values include, but are not limited to, those in the following table.

listheader.description: The sensor group has not been initialized.

member.name: IMFSensorDevice.GetStreamAttributesCount
member.summary: Gets the count of stream attribute stores for the sensor device. This number represents the number of total streams available for the device because every valid stream must have an attribute store that contains at least the stream ID and stream category.
member.param: A member of the enumeration specifying whether the attribute store count is being requested for an input or output stream.
The number of stream attributes available for this sensor device.

returns.para: The method returns an HRESULT. Possible values include, but are not limited to, those in the following table.

listheader.description: The sensor group has not been initialized.

member.name: IMFSensorDevice.GetSymbolicLink
member.summary: Gets the symbolic link name of the sensor device.
member.param: Buffer of cchSymbolicLink characters where the symbolic link name will be written. The buffer must be large enough to account for the null terminator.
Number of characters available in SymbolicLink buffer.

Output parameter containing the number of characters written to SymbolicLink. This includes the null terminator. If SymbolicLink is null and cchSymbolicLink is 0, pcchWritten will contain the number of characters needed (including the null terminator) to store the symbolic link name.

returns.para: The method returns an HRESULT. Possible values include, but are not limited to, those in the following table.

listheader.description: The buffer provided in the SymbolicLink parameter is not large enough to contain the symbolic link name, including the null terminator.
The sensor device has not been initialized.

member.name: IMFSensorDevice.SetSensorDeviceMode
member.summary: Sets a value that specifies the sharing mode of the sensor device to either controller or shared.
member.param: A member of the enumeration specifying whether the device is in shared or controller mode.

returns.para: The method returns an HRESULT. Possible values include, but are not limited to, those in the following table.

listheader.description: The sensor group has not been initialized.

member.name: IMFSensorDevice
member.summary: Represents a sensor device that can belong to a sensor group, which is represented by the interface. The term "device" in this context could refer to a physical device, a custom media source, or a frame provider.
